https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oEqtNB6jtUVG5yRPRwBWoOQTpE.jpg A young woman tries to reconstruct the trip her friend took to Brazil for the Football World Cup. While she has no news of him, she relies on the images he sent her to find his trace. Brazil_14
